dictionary.item: ## Script (Python) "manage_sitemapxml" ##bind container=container ##bind context=context ##bind namespace= ##bind script=script ##bind subpath=traverse_subpath ##parameters= ##title=*** DO NOT DELETE OR MODIFY *** ## # Author: SNTL Publishing GmbH & Co. KG # WWW: http://www.sntl-publishing.com # Date: 01.06.2018 # Version: 0.99 # Comments: Create a multiligual static Google compliant sitemap for FTP-/HTML-Export # Note: Uses the Config-Option "ASP.ip_or_domain" to set the URL path; # isResource() / not public is excluded # Params: Set variable URL1 '/content/' | '/' in this Code # depending on your web server configuration, the 'content' node might be # removed form published ########################################################################################## request = container.REQUEST response = request.response zms = context.content request.set('preview',None) standard_html_request = zms.f_standard_html_request(request) URL1 = '/content/' #or '/' depending on Webserver-config domain = zms.getConfProperty('ASP.ip_or_domain') node_count = 0 sitemapxml = '' urlitems = [] def get_all_date_attrs(node): list_of_dates = [] list_of_dates.append(node.getLangFmtDate(node.attr('change_dt'),'eng','%Y-%m-%d')) list_of_dates.append(node.getLangFmtDate(node.attr('work_dt'),'eng','%Y-%m-%d')) list_of_dates.append(node.getLangFmtDate(node.attr('created_dt'),'eng','%Y-%m-%d')) list_of_dates = [ d for d in list_of_dates if d != 'None' ] return list_of_dates def get_lastmod(node): list_of_dates = [] list_of_dates.extend(get_all_date_attrs(node)) subnodes = node.filteredChildNodes(request,zms.PAGEELEMENTS) for node in subnodes: list_of_dates.extend(get_all_date_attrs(node)) list_of_dates.sort(reverse=True) return list_of_dates[0] # ############ XML-TEMPLATE-1 ################## urlset_tmpl = """ %s """ # ############ XML-TEMPLATE-2 ################## urlitem_tmpl = """ %s %s %s %s """ # ############################################## # ITERATE TREE FOR EVERY LANGUAGE for lang in zms.getLanguages(request): request.set('lang',lang) nodes = [zms] nodes.extend(zms.filteredTreeNodes(request,[zms.PAGES,'ZMSFile','downloadfile','file'],max_len=None)) for node in nodes: path = node.breadcrumbs_obj_path() forbidden_nodes = [ ob for ob in path if not ( ob.hasPublicAccess() and ob.isActive(request) ) ] if not forbidden_nodes: node_count+=1 title = node.attr('titlealt') loc = 'https://' + domain + URL1 + node.getHref2IndexHtml(request).split('/content/')[1] lastmod = get_lastmod(node) changefreq = 'monthly' priority = node.attr('attr_bot_priority')!='' and node.attr('attr_bot_priority') or '0.5' urlitem = urlitem_tmpl%(title,loc,lastmod,changefreq,priority) urlitems.append(urlitem) sitemap_xml = urlset_tmpl%(node_count,'\n'.join(urlitems)) root_node = zms.getHome() # Check whether file object 'sitemap.xml' alread exists: if len([f for f in root_node.objectValues('File') if f.getId()=='sitemap.xml'])==0: root_node.manage_addFile('sitemap.xml',title='SITEMAP',content_type='text/xml') f = [f for f in root_node.objectValues('File') if f.getId()=='sitemap.xml'][0] f.manage_edit(title='SITEMAP', content_type='text/xml',precondition='', filedata=sitemap_xml) # FEEDBACK request.set('message','sitemap.xml successfully generated on %s visible pages'%(domain,node_count)) return request.get('message','ERROR: No Message') # TEST # response.setHeader('content-type','text/xml; charset=utf-8') # return sitemap_xml
